Class CsvInternshipRepository

java.lang.Object
CsvInternshipRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IInternshipRepository
public class CsvInternshipRepository extends Object implements IInternshipRepository
CSV-based repository implementation for managing internship opportunities. Loads and saves internship data to/from a CSV file.
